info.title: getBlockHeader example
info.description: This is an API example for getBlockHeader, a method to retrieve the header of a specific block in the TON blockchain.

parameters.name: seqno
parameters.description: The sequence number of the block

200.description: The header of the specified block

workchain.description: The workchain ID of the block

shard.description: The shard ID of the block

seqno.description: The sequence number of the block

root_hash.description: The root hash of the block

file_hash.description: The file hash of the block

global_id.description: The global ID of the block

after_merge.description: Whether the block was created after a merge

before_split.description: Whether the block was created before a split

after_split.description: Whether the block was created after a split

want_merge.description: Whether the block wants to merge

want_split.description: Whether the block wants to split

validator_list_hash_short.description: The short hash of the validator list

catchain_seqno.description: The sequence number in the catchain

min_ref_mc_seqno.description: The minimum referenced masterchain sequence number

is_key_block.description: Whether the block is a key block

prev_key_block_seqno.description: The sequence number of the previous key block

start_lt.description: The start logical time of the block

end_lt.description: The end logical time of the block

gen_utime.description: The generation time of the block

vert_seqno.description: The vertical sequence number of the block
